concept.title: Creating a Schedule for a Model

conbody.p: You can schedule a model that you created for email distribution in PDF, CSV, or Hyperlink format. To do this, perform the following steps:

ol.li: Expand the nodes Data Design Analytics Workbench in the left panel and select the Models tab. The Analytics Workbench is shown in the screenshot below.

Select a model you want to schedule, click the checkbox besides the listed model. Click (create a new schedule with this model).
The Anlytics Model Schedule Setting window opens.The Selected model Get Model COnfiguation is already in the Scheduled Models list box.

Set the following fields:
Enter a name for the model's schedule in the Schedule Name textbox.
To schedule the start date and time, to run the selected model, click in the Start at text box. Set the date and time in calendar popup. You can also manually enter or modify the values in the text box. The screenshot in step 2, shows the model is scheduled to start at 2 am on the 21st of December.
To repeat the scheduled run once or more at intervals, specify the values in the Repeat Every fields: 1. specify the number of times in the textbox and 2. select the required interval from the dropdown list. The screenshot in step 2 shows that the model is scheduled to run at the scheduled time once every week for 4 weeks.
Add more models to the schedule, from the Select an Analytical Model to schedule dropdown list, and click Add Model.
To run the scheduled models at the same time, check the Concurent checkbox.
To specify the input parameters for a scheduled models, select the required model in the Specify the model input parameters, model: <Scheduled Model Name> table. Each model has its own input parameter table.The following screenshot shows the table for the model Schema Name Configuation.
